creator: oros@apache.org
text:
If there is more than one RecordingController it is not possible to select the
one the proxy should use to record requests.

creator: oros@apache.org
text:
The first ENABLED RecordingController in the tree is used by the proxy.

(org/apache/jmeter/protocol/http/proxy/ProxyControl.java 1.8)
Bulk-editing to close all bugs reported fixed by 1.8.1.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
